member.name: M:JsAction.JsActionHelperExtension.JsScript(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String[])
member.summary: Writes into view the needed script reference for JsAction.
member.returns: Html String that represents script reference

member.name: T:JsAction.JsActionAttribute
member.summary: JsActionAttribute can be used to mark Action Method and generate related Javascript

member.name: P:JsAction.JsActionAttribute.MethodName
member.summary: Gets or sets Javascript function name to generate. If null, Action name will be used.

member.name: P:JsAction.JsActionAttribute.Verb
member.summary: Gets or sets Http Verb to use in Ajax request. Must be specified if multiple Verbs are accepted for same Action Method.

member.name: P:JsAction.JsActionAttribute.Groups
member.summary: Gets or sets group names for function, separated by comma values

member.name: P:JsAction.JsActionAttribute.CacheRequest
member.summary: Gets or sets if cache option parameter should be set.

member.name: P:JsAction.JsActionAttribute.Async
member.summary: Gets or sets if request should be async or not.

member.name: T:JsAction.HttpSingleVerb
member.summary: Enumeration that rapresents supported HttpVerbs for JsAction library

member.name: T:JsAction.JsActionHandler
member.summary: Http and Route handler for javascript file generation

member.name: M:JsAction.JsActionHandler.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Costructs a new hanlder for JsAction requests
member.param: Optional assembly array in which search for JsAction attribute. If null is specified, only current one will be taken in consideration.
